title: riot plz
body: I relly relly want dragonblade riven but I cant get it.Riot plz I have all the skins and chromas on her but not the dragonblade.Ik u will not give it to me but plz make a main happy {{champion:92}}

replies.body: Dragon Blade Riven is a [legacy ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins)skin, so she can return to the store at anytime.  Keep an eye on our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page for info on that.  In the meantime, you can still find it through mystery skins or hextech crafting!
